subtitle: A savoury  fish dish that is quick to make for any time of the week. Choose firm thick fillets or loins of cod.

method.text: Preheat oven, if using, to 190°C. Place fish in a shallow ovenproof dish and pour over the lemon juice.
Mix together the breadcrumbs with half the parsley, lemon rind and seasoning. Stir in the melted butter. Press the breadcrumb mixture over the fish to form a crust.
Cook in oven or under grill for 15-20 min or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
Meanwhile, cook potatoes in a pan of lightly salted boiling water for 20 min or until tender. Drain.
Heat milk to boiling point then pour over boiled potatoes. Mash until smooth. Stir in remaining parsley and lemon rind. Season to taste. Serve mash on warmed plates with fish placed on top.

title: Roast cod on lemon and parsley mash
